heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesSubtitle: A team of professionals dedicated to your physical, mental, and spiritual well-being.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated with our upcoming events, workshops, and news.

guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is composed of passionate professionals with a deep-rooted connection to ancestral wisdom and a commitment to your well-being. Each guide brings a unique blend of experience, compassion, and expertise to create a safe and transformative space for your journey.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events.
noUpcomingCeremonies: No upcoming ceremonies at this time. Check back soon!
authRequiredDescription: Please sign in to continue with your reservation.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca, also known as the 'vine of the soul,' is a sacred psychoactive brew originating from the Amazon rainforest. It has been used for centuries by indigenous communities for spiritual healing and divination. The brew combines the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub, which work together to induce profound visionary experiences and deep introspection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The primary psychoactive compound in Ayahuasca is DMT, which, when combined with the MAOI from the caapi vine, becomes orally active. This allows for an extended journey, typically lasting 4 to 6 hours. During this time, individuals may experience vivid visions, emotional release, and a heightened sense of connection to themselves and the universe. It is a powerful tool for confronting past traumas, resolving internal conflicts, and gaining clarity on one's life path.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is often referred to as a 'master plant' or a 'teacher' because it guides individuals through their inner landscapes, revealing truths and providing insights that can be life-altering. The experience is deeply personal and unique to each individual, offering what is needed for their specific healing and growth.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Participants often report a significant reduction in mental clutter, enhanced focus, and a newfound sense of purpose and direction in their lives.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can facilitate the release of deeply suppressed emotions and traumas, leading to profound emotional healing and a greater sense of inner peace.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Many experience a strengthened connection to their inner self, others, nature, and the universe, fostering a sense of unity and belonging.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a collective healing experience. Group ceremonies provide a supportive environment where the shared energy of participants can amplify the healing process. It's an opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals on a similar path of self-discovery.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies. This one-on-one setting with our experienced guides allows for a deeply focused and tailored journey, addressing your specific intentions and needs in a contained and private space.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn more about the sacred Ayahuasca brew, its origins, and its profound effects on the mind, body, and spirit.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the compassionate and experienced guides who will support you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a meaningful experience. Discover our guidelines for diet, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay connected with our community and be the first to know about our next events, workshops, and news.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit.

preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your transformative experience.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. You are now ready for your journey. We look forward to seeing you at the ceremony.

questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to achieve or heal...
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here are the answers you submitted.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Follow these recommendations to ensure a safe and profound experience.
preparationProcessDescription: We guide you from the initial preparation to the integration of your experience, ensuring a safe and transformative journey.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space guided by experts, where you will connect with the medicine in a safe and respectful environment.
experienceProcessDescription: A profound journey of introspection and healing, where you can release, understand, and transform.
integrationProcessDescription: We provide you with tools and support to incorporate the lessons learned into your daily life, ensuring lasting change.
dietSubtitle: For at least 3 days before the ceremony, we recommend a clean diet to prepare your body and mind.
allowedFoodsList:
• - Fresh fruits and vegetables.
  • - Whole grains (oats, brown rice, quinoa).
  • - Legumes (lentils, chickpeas).
  • - Lean proteins (chicken, fish - no pork).
  • - Water and herbal teas.
prohibitedFoodsList:
• - Red meat and pork.
  • - Fermented foods (aged cheese, soy sauce).
  • - Spicy and heavily processed foods.
  • - Alcohol and recreational drugs.
  • - Caffeine (coffee, black tea).
mentalPrepSubtitle: Create a receptive state of mind for your journey.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm your mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to document your thoughts, feelings, and dreams before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is an opportunity for deep emotional release. Be open to confronting and letting go of old wounds, fears, and patterns. Our guides are here to support you in this process, creating a safe space for you to be vulnerable and embrace your transformation. Trust the medicine, trust the process, and trust yourself.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience.
comfortItemsList:
• - Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors recommended).
  • - A blanket and a pillow for your comfort.
  • - A water bottle.
essentialsList:
• - A journal and pen to write down your insights.
  • - Any personal sacred items you wish to have with you.
  • - An open heart and a curious mind.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here you can find the details of the ceremonies you are assigned to.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not currently assigned to any ceremonies. Explore our available ceremonies and book your spot.

exportDataDescription: Download a full backup of your Firestore data (Users, Ceremonies, Guides, etc.) as a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore your application from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: Importing a backup will overwrite all current data in your database. This action cannot be undone. An automatic backup of the current state will be created before importing.
importSuccessDescription: Your data has been restored from the backup file.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can roll back to this state if the import caused issues.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data from before the last import? This will overwrite the data you just imported.
rollbackSuccessDescription: Your data has been restored to its previous state.
